QuestData.Title: Thargad's Camp
QuestData.Description: It pleases me to see that you still draw breath, $c. I have been sent word that the demon activity in the south has been intensifying.$b$bThere is a camp on the borderlands there that is in danger of being cut off if the demons move northward.$b$bPerhaps you could lend them a hand?$b$bI know the leader of the camp there is Thargad. He will be able to direct you wisely.$b$bThank you, friend. Be well.
QuestData.LogDescription: Karnum Marshweaver wants you to speak to Thargad.
QuestData.RewardText: Demons?$b$bOh, there be lots I can tell yeh 'bout demons!
